decision_conditions: Condition : 1 - The development hereby permitted shall be begun before the expiration of three years from the date of this permission.

Condition : 2 - The proposed development shall be carried out in all respects in accordance with the proposals contained in the application and the plans submitted (Location Plan; DOC/PLAN/03/1; DOC/PLAN/03/2; Planning Statement; Received 31/10/2017.) therewith and approved by the Local Planning Authority, or as shall have been otherwise agreed in writing by the Local Planning Authority before the building is used.
Condition : 3 - The use hereby permitted shall not be open to customers outside the following times: 0800 and 2300 Monday to Saturday and 0800 to 2200 Sundays and Bank Holidays.
Condition : 4 - The use hereby permitted shall be confined to sales to customers attending the premises, and shall not extend to the delivery of food or drink to customers by vehicle.
Condition : 5 - No further fans, louvres, ducts or other external plant shall be installed without the prior approval of the Local Planning Authority.

Condition : 6 - The use shall not commence until a scheme for the ventilation of the premises of an appropriate outlet level, including details of sound attenuation for any necessary plant and the standard or dilution expected has been submitted to and approved by the Local Planning Authority.

Condition : 7 - The use hereby permitted shall not be begun until a delivery and servicing plan showing all servicing to be undertaken through the bus garage site has been submitted and approved by the Local Planning Authority. The delivery and servicing arrangements shall not be carried out otherwise than in accordance with the approved details.

Condition : 8 - The access doorway to the restaurant shall have a minimum clear width of 900mm, a level surface or ramp between the pavement and the floor, a door handle of not more than 1m above ground level and glass entrance doors and glazed screens must be clearly defined with manifestation on the glass at two levels: 850 mm to 1000 mm and 1400 mm to 1600 mm. The manifestation should be a sign or logo at least 150 mm high.
description: Change of use from hairdressers (Use Class A1) to a restaurant/cafe (Use Class A3)
